alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 8:24PM CDT until October 15 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Saline County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Salem in Saline County, or 13 miles northwest of Benton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... West Little Rock... Bryant... Shannon Hills... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Salem in Saline County... Chenal Valley... Otter Creek... Alexander... Avilla... Congo... Grape... Bland... Ferndale... Natural Steps... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
